botan.pubkey.algo.ecdh

ECDH

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

struct ECDHPublicKey;
This class represents ECDH Public Keys.

this()(auto ref const ECGroup dom_par, auto ref const PointGFp public_point);
Construct a public key from a given public point.

Params:
ECGroup dom_par the domain parameters associated with this key
PointGFp public_point the public point defining this key

struct ECDHPrivateKey;
This class represents ECDH Private Keys.

this(RandomNumberGenerator rng, ref const ECGroup domain, BigInt x = BigInt(0));
Generate a new private key

Params:
RandomNumberGenerator rng a random number generator
ECGroup domain parameters to used for this key
BigInt x the private key; if zero, a new random key is generated

class ECDHKAOperation: botan.pubkey.pk_ops.KeyAgreement;
ECDH operation
